desc.zh-Hans: 格拉斯哥地铁（Glasgow Subway）位于苏格兰格拉斯哥，始于1896年12月，由一条闭环地铁线构成，分成内外环运营。全长10.4公里，共有15个车站（全部是地下站）。
desc.en: The Glasgow Subway, located in Glasgow, Scotland, began in December 1896. It consists of a closed loop subway line and is divided into inner and outer rings for operation. The total length is 10.4 kilometers, with a total of 15 stations (all underground).
